name: CHAINS (itch)
description:
This is a rage game made by BeaverGames.

You go down into the deep, dark, abyss. Through the 25 levels of insanity, and the 3 secrets they hold, Double Jump, Float, and the platform summoner. When used together, it is possible to get the almighty Jetpack, and escape the abyss. Don't bother with the menu button, it's broken, just like everything else down here in the dark.
